title: Vayne mechanics anyone?
body:
I know, I'll play {{champion:67}}  hehe let me auto 3 times for a kill! XD legit this happens every game. Like why is this a thing? It's pretty unhealthy and is totally not fair. I went from 3-0 to 3-4 because Vayne kills me in 3 autos. Yeah I understand I shouldn't be trying to fight her if I can't win but I mean here I was just tryna run for the hills with lord baby Jesus at my side but not even he could save me. Rip me ): {{champion:7}}  {{item:3070}} 

Pls do something to nerf Vayne? ): ;-;

replies.body: icant wait to kill yourlb in 1 crit as {{champion:119}}

Coming from a Vayne main here. You're not seriously saying to nerf Vayne? Your just salty lol. Vayne has the lowest damage of all adcs until the mid game. She dies easily to jhin, miss fortune and ashe and she is extremely squishy and easy to blow up. Sure she has insane damage late game but she has to position to dodge cc and damage. In higher elos, shes high risk high reward because of how effective she is but how easy it is to focus and blow up. Shes balanced and the only thing you did was play to her strengths. Literally walking up to a veigar when your missing half your health.... YOURE ASKING TO GET FUCKED!!!

Yeah Psylock but the thing is I wasn't leaning against her, I know drakes are important but like with a mage/assassin they have combos to use and land, other adc's have to actually kite and think about their positioning meanwhile Vayne tumbles into you 90% of the time and you're dead in 3 autos
